title: Aromatic blackeye bean curry
description: This delicious vegan curry recipe is spiced with flavours from the west coast of India.Each serving provides 345kcal	,12g protein, 22g carbohydrate (of which 3g sugars), 20g fat (of which 5g saturates), 13g fibre and trace salt.
ingredients: 2 x 410g/14oz tins of black eyed beans (or use 225g/8oz dried beans, soaked overnight and cooked)
2 tbsp fresh coconut, grated (optional, but do not use desiccated)
